ResearchProjectDef.label: death acidifier
ResearchProjectDef.description: Produce death acidifiers to prevent other players from killing your colonists for their possessions.

ResearchProjectDef.label: mechanoid relations
ResearchProjectDef.description: Study the language of the mechanoids. Whilst mechanoids are not "diplomatic" creatures, they may be open to certain deals that benefit them.

ResearchProjectDef.label: native languages
ResearchProjectDef.description: Study the language of the native tribes. While this won't necessarily improve their relations towards you, it will allow you to give them bounty offers against other players.
